00165 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00166     Insert
00167     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00168 template <class T> void ElementList<T>::Append(T *entry)
00169 {
00170     T *new_entry = new T(*entry);
00171     new_entry->SetNext(0);
00172     PushBack(new_entry);
00173 }   // Insert
00174 
00175 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176     AppendDistinct
00177     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00178 template<class T> BOOLEAN ElementList<T>::AppendDistinct(T *entry)
00179 {
00180     BOOLEAN add_entry = !Exists(entry);
00181     if (add_entry) {
00182         T *new_entry = new T(*entry);
00183         new_entry->SetNext(0);
00184         PushBack(new_entry);
00185     } // if
00186     return (add_entry);
00187 }   // AppendDistinct
00188 
00189 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190     Exists
00191     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00192 template<class T> BOOLEAN ElementList<T>::Exists(T *entry) const
00193 {
00194     BOOLEAN exists = FALSE;
00195     if (entry != 0) {
00196         T *list_entry = (T*)GetFront();
00197         while (list_entry != 0 && !exists) {
00198             exists = (*entry == *list_entry);
00199             list_entry = list_entry->GetNext();
00200         } // while
00201     } // if
00202     return (exists);
00203 }   // Exists
00204 
00205 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206     Remove
00207     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00208 template<class T> INT ElementList<T>::Remove(T *entry) 
00209 {
00210     BOOLEAN removed_entries = 0;
00211     if (entry != 0) {
00212         T *list_entry = (T*)GetFront();
00213         T *next_list_entry = 0;
00214         while (list_entry != 0) {
00215             next_list_entry = list_entry->GetNext();
00216             if (*entry == *list_entry) {
00217                 removed_entries++;
00218                 Base::Remove(list_entry);
00219                 SaveDelete(list_entry);
00220             }
00221             list_entry = next_list_entry;
00222         } // while
00223     } // if
00224     return (removed_entries);
00225 }   // Remove
00226 
00227 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00228     Clear
00229     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00230 template<class T> void ElementList<T>::Clear()
00231 {
00232     // clean up existing plmn list
00233     T *entry;
00234     while (!IsEmpty()) {
00235         entry = GetFront();
00236         PopFront();
00237         SaveDelete(entry);
00238     } // end while
00239 }   // Clear
00240 
00241 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00242     operator =
00243     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00244 template <class T> ElementList<T>& ElementList<T>::operator =(const ElementList<T> &list)
00245 {
00246     if (&list != this) {        // guard from self assignment
00247         Clear();
00248         // assign new plmn list
00249         T *entry = list.GetFront();
00250         while (entry != 0) {
00251             Append(entry);
00252             entry = entry->GetNext();
00253         } // while
00254     } // if
00255     return (*this);
00256 }   // operator =

00284 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00285     Insert
00286     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00287 template<class T> void SortedElementList<T>::Insert(T *entry)
00288 {
00289     T *new_entry = new T;
00290     *new_entry = *entry;
00291     new_entry->SetNext(0);
00292 
00293     T *t = (T*)GetFront();
00294     T *prev = 0;
00295 
00296     while(t != 0 && *t < *new_entry) {
00297         prev = t;
00298         t = (T*)t->GetNext();
00299     }
00300 
00301     if (GetFront() == 0 || prev == 0)
00302         this->PushFront(new_entry);
00303     else {
00304         prev->SetNext(new_entry);
00305         new_entry->SetNext(t);
00306     }
00307 }   // Insert
